title: Deep Reinforcement Learning for Autonomous Navigation
description: Developed a deep reinforcement learning framework for autonomous robot navigation in complex environments.

title: Federated Learning for Privacy-Preserving Machine Learning
description: Investigating federated learning approaches to preserve privacy while maintaining model performance.

title: Neural Style Transfer: From Theory to Practice
description: Explored neural style transfer techniques and developed a practical application for artistic image generation.

title: Attention Mechanisms in Transformer Architectures
description: Analyzed attention mechanisms in transformer models and proposed improvements for efficiency.
